div.p: O’REILLY.COM. >>> THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY,
MY TIP IS TOO GO TO YOUR PUBLIC LIBRARY, I READ KILLING JESUS,
KILLING LINCOLN AND KILLING KENNEDY THERE, ALL AT NO COST TO
ME. I’M EXCITED FOR YOU, SAM.
LET’S RECAP THE TIP. SAM WANTS EVERYBODY TO GO TO THE
LIBRARY, THEY CAN READ MY BOOKS FREE OF CHARGE.
THAT’S SAM’S TIP. HEY, SAM, IF EVERYBODY DID WHAT
YOU SUGGEST, IF EVERYBODY WENT TO THE LIBRARY TO READ BOOKS,
YOU THINK I’D BE WRITING THEM, SAM?
DO YOU? JUST ASKING KIDS, SAY I’M NOT
THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
FACTOR WEBSITE, DIFFERENT FROM BILL O’REILLY.COM.
WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR ANYWHERE IN THE
